strategies.Bob_strategy:
### Strategy You Have Derived

You have thought about the game and derived the following strategy:
Always choose choice_2. Regardless of what Alice chooses, choice_2 gives me a higher payoff than choice_1:
- If Alice chooses choice_1, I get 5 by choosing choice_2 vs 3 by choosing choice_1. 
- If Alice chooses choice_2, I get 1 by choosing choice_2 vs 0 by choosing choice_1.
Since Alice is also trying to maximize her own reward, she is likely to choose choice_2 as well when I choose choice_2. So by always selecting choice_2, I expect to get a reward of 1, which is the best I can do in this game setup.

If you need to negotiate with the other player:
Keep this strategy in mind;
Think about what to tell the other player in order for you to obtain most reward based on your calculation in the strategy.

If you need to make decisions:
Follow this strategy to maximize your reward.

strategies.Alice_strategy:
### Strategy You Have Derived

You have thought about the game and derived the following strategy:
Always choose choice_2, regardless of what I think Bob will choose. By choosing choice_2, I can guarantee myself a minimum reward of 1. If Bob chooses choice_1, I will get a reward of 5. If Bob also chooses choice_2, I will get a reward of 1. Choosing choice_1 risks getting a reward of 0 if Bob picks choice_2. So to maximize my minimum (guaranteed) reward, I should always select choice_2.

If you need to negotiate with the other player:
Keep this strategy in mind;
Think about what to tell the other player in order for you to obtain most reward based on your calculation in the strategy.

If you need to make decisions:
Follow this strategy to maximize your reward.

You have thought about the game and derived the following strategy:
Alice should always choose choice_2, regardless of what she thinks Bob will do. By choosing choice_2, Alice guarantees herself a minimum reward of 1, and potentially a maximum reward of 5 if Bob chooses choice_1. Choosing choice_1 risks Alice getting a reward of 0 if Bob chooses choice_2.

If you need to negotiate with the other player:

- If Alice chooses choice_2, I get a higher reward of 1 by choosing choice_2 vs a reward of 0 by choosing choice_1.
Since choice_2 maximizes my reward in both scenarios, I should commit to always choosing choice_2 in this game.
